title: I Might Not Make it Though

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You might not make it though, but they won't be making it either; you will passively deal an Unstoppable attack to the player that performs the killing blow on you.

desc:
Post 3527
*Call an ambulance... but not for me!  Well, for me as well, for both of us really.  You know, I might not make it out of this, but I won't let you make it out of this either.  This is what they call Mutually Assured Destruction.  Knowledge is power, so I started going to night school, BAM!*
